title: Instant PotÂ® Thai red chicken and potato curry
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1/2 onion, diced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 stalk celery, sliced', '6 large red potatoes, diced', '100g cherry tomatoes, halved', '60g chopped carrots, or more to taste', '2 boneless chicken breasts, sliced', '1 (400g) tin coconut milk', '2 tablespoons fish sauce', '120ml water', '60g frozen peas, or more to taste', '3 tablespoons Thai red curry paste', '2 tablespoons soft brown sugar', '3 chicken stock cubes, crumbled']
